comments.body:
Since the license is being manually packaged, please add a link above the `license_file` line with a link to:

https://github.com/OpenMined/syft-proto/pull/103

as a way of tracking and as a reminder to check if the license is included in the source distribution in a future release.
your pr has been merged now, would be worth doing it now?
I presume you would need to push out a new release to pypi first, but if you want to do that, you could base the recipe off of the new version.

A few other notes:

- It looks like the current version on pypi is 0.4.4
- I think the upstream packaging is broken since the `setup.py` copies `proto.json`, but that file isn't in the source distribution, which is causing the build here to fail.

already opened a pr to add that file
https://github.com/OpenMined/syft-proto/pull/102
so I guess we are going to have to wait for both the json file and license to be added.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@  summary: PySyft protocol constants.
  license: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
